recommendation: It’s feeling nice out there! Jeans, long sleeves. You probably want a layer just in case though.
Wear some pants and long sleeves.  You can even do short sleeves if you bring a sweatshirt!
Bae! Its nice out! Should be fine in shorts/tee shirt/dress etc, but might want to bring something just in case!
Love this weather.  You’ll be very comfortable in most anything, but could be a bit chilly!
